attributes.action: Restrict HGV and other such vehicles to certain hours for road usage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Two zones could be created - zone 1 would be between 7pm and 5am and zone 2 would be between 5am and 7pm - a hefty additional tax would be levied for using roads during zone 2 thereby clearing usage for other traffic during peak times thereby saving huge sums of money wasted in traffic jams and accidents.
